resources.string: Entry required before search can be executed!
All documents used in this application are public domain. A big thanks for inspiration and help for this app came from https://www.reformed.org/."
To exclude answers from results, hit the No Answers Checkbox under Search Options.\n To exclude proofs from search, Hit no Proofs checkbox.
Hit the home button to go back home
Select a theme by hitting Themes at the top of your screen

The Notes Section is for saving your favorite sections of confessions, creeds and catechisms. Use this to take a quick note of a topic your searching, or add your comments on a particular chapter or article you\'re studying.
Hit the themes button at the top of the screen to change from light to dark mode
Do you want to save any changes to your note?
Do you want to perform another search?
Do you want to leave the app?
Welcome to the Reformed Collective Confession Search App!
For help, click on the help tab below.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

This is the main section of the application. You will be able to search a variety of topics in the confessions and creeds here. You can search chapters, topics, questions here. Simply pick an option from the given options, type an entry in the search bar, select desired documents, hit any options to modify your search, and hit submit. Your results will arrive in order from most relevant to least.

Here are the available options to you in the search: \n To search topics, hit the Topic button, Chapters/Questions in Confessions/Catechisms hit the Chapter/Question Button, To simply read the document, hit the Read button. \n For more advanced filtering such as answer/proof removal, hit the no answers/no proofs buttons, to search all documents, hit the search all documents button. This will depend on what document type you have selected. For all documents, you\'ll need the \'All\' type selected, otherwise it will be limited to what you have selected.

Under the notes tab, you can store your favorite verses, any thoughts or ideas that come to mind as you\'re studying. Navigate to the notes tab and hit new note to get started on your notes. When finished, hit save note and it will be stored on your device until you remove it or edit it to add more. \nTo delete a note, simply swipe right on the note item in the notes section. \n To save a note on something you found in search, simply hit save note on the result page and it will take you to the page to edit your note.

This section of the application is brand new. It will allow you to read the bible by simply navigating driectly to the passage you want to read. Simply press on each of the spinners and select your desired translation, book, chapter and verse. After that, hit submit. It\'s that easy.
Sources for these documents are in public domain since they are old. Bible translations will be cited below alongside any copyrighted content used with permission.
Each search result page has the share button enabled to allow for easy sharing with your friends or favorite social media site.
